title: Upper Delaware Scenic & Recreational River: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore         "Riders of the Purple Sage" is just one of many books written by Zane Grey sold at the Zane Grey Museum.   Looking for a guide to the park's plants and animals? Searching for that perfect book about the history of the Roebling Bridge or Zane Grey? Start your search with Eastern National, the park's cooperating association, which operates a bookstore at the Zane Grey Museum. A portion of Eastern National's proceeds are returned to the park. For more information, contact:  Eastern National 470 Maryland Drive, Suite 1 Fort Washington, PA 19034 (215) 283-6900 (207) 283-6923 (fax)  You can also purchase a limited selection of items directly from Eastern National.
